SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
addCategory
Represents the user interface for adding, updating, and deleting categories.
addProduct
This class represents the user interface for adding products.
Admin
The Admin class represents an administrator in the system.
AdminDAO
The AdminDAO class provides data access methods for interacting with the database related to administrator operations.
AdminUI
The AdminUI class represents the user interface for the admin functionality.
billl
 
Cart
The Cart class represents a cart containing a collection of items.
Category
The Category class represents a category in a composite structure.
CategoryDAO
The CategoryDAO class provides data access methods for interacting with the database related to category operations.
CategoryTreeFrame
The CategoryTreeFrame class represents the user interface for displaying a category tree and related product information.
CategorywiseProducts
The CategorywiseProducts class represents the user interface for generating and displaying pie charts representing product acquisition across different categories.
Composite
The Composite interface represents the common interface for all components in the Composite pattern.
DatabaseConnection
The DatabaseConnection class provides a utility for establishing a connection to a MySQL database.
DatabaseConnectivity
The DatabaseConnectivity class is responsible for establishing the connection to the database.
DatabaseConnector
The DatabaseConnector class is responsible for establishing and managing the connection to the database.
Employee
The Employee class represents an employee in the system.
employeeDAO
The employeeDAO class provides data access methods for Employee objects in the database.
employeeFrame
The employeeFrame class represents the GUI for managing employee information.
graphMenu
The graphMenu class represents the graphical user interface for accessing reports.
InventoryFromFile
The InventoryFromFile class is responsible for loading categories and products from CSV files, associating products with categories, and providing methods to list and display information about categories and products.
Item
The Item class represents an item in an order.
ItemContainer
The ItemContainer class represents a container for managing a collection of items.
LoginUI
The LoginUI class represents the user interface for user authentication.
Logout
The Logout class provides methods for logging out users and administrator.
Main
 
Manager
The Manager class represents a user in the system with the role type Manager.
Managermenu
The Manager menu class represents the user interface for the manager's menu.
operatorGraph
The operatorGraph class represents the user interface for displaying pie charts of orders done by operators (sales assistants).
Order
The Order class represents a customer order containing a collection of items.
OrderDAO
The OrderDAO class provides data access methods for handling orders and related operations in the database.
OrderGraphUI
The OrderGraphUI class represents the user interface for displaying order graphs.
Product
The Product class represents a product.
ProductDAO
The ProductDAO class provides data access methods for handling products and related operations in the database.
productReport
The productReport class represents a JFrame for displaying bar charts of product expiration dates.
Role
The Role class is an abstract class representing a role in the system.
SalesAssistant
The SalesAssistant class represents the role of a sales assistant (also referred to as an operator) in the system.
SalesAssistantUI
SalesAssistantUI class represents the user interface for the sales assistant (operator) functionality.
salesBydate
The salesBydate class represents a user interface for displaying bar charts of sales based on date range.
stockAlert
The stockAlert class represents a user interface for displaying bar charts of stock alerts.
updateCategory
The updateCategory class represents a user interface for updating category information.
updateProduct
The updateProduct class represents a user interface for updating product information.
updateStock
The updateStock class represents a user interface for updating stock information.
User
The User class represents a user in the system with properties like username, name, password, and role.
UserDAO
The UserDAO class provides data access methods for user-related operations in the database.
